channel.title: Help with trade rep++

problem:owner cant trade i got (no idea were to start,got lots of experience but never had to code trading for owner)
anoyne please help rep++ thanks =)

item.title: Help with trade rep++
item.dc:creator: @arthur323 arthur323
item.description:
@arthur323 wrote:

317?=

  1. Go to client.java

  2. ctrl + f —> search ----->

if(player.getRights() >= 2) {
player.sm(“Admins can’t trade.”);
return;
}
if(other.getRights() >= 2) {
player.sm(“You can’t trade admins.”);
return;
}
if(player.getRights() >= 2) {
player.sm(“Admins can’t trade.”);
return;
}
if(other.getRights() >= 2) {
player.sm(“You can’t trade admins.”);
return;
}

(this is 562 code but prolly will work)

for only owner to trade idk, but remove that if u want admins to trade.
